resources.string: This is an open-source app, you can check code here
The same as on the device

We use Google Drive to save and restore your data in the app.

Don't worry, we won't have access to your Google Drive files except for the app data file we'll be creating.

We recommend that you make regular backups so as not to lose your data and restore it when you reinstall the application or on another device.
You do not have an email application on your device
We\'ll delete this label and remove it from all of your wishes. Your wishes wont\'t be deleted.
An error occurred while deleting wishes
You have not added any wishes yet, click on the plus button below to add a new wish
You haven\'t completed any wishes yet
You haven\'t added label %s to any wish yet
Try this app for storing and sharing your wishes\n\nhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ru.vitaliy.belyaev.wishapp
Failed to check if there is a backup
You have not recovered data on this device. We recommend restoring data from an existing backup before creating a new backup.
When restoring data from a copy, all current data in the application will be lost
When updating data from a backup, all current data in the application will be lost

We use Google Drive to save and restore your data in the app. To do this, we need permission to use your Google Drive.\n\nDon\'t worry, we won\'t have access to your Google Drive files except for the app data file we\'ll be creating.
At the moment you do not have a backup.\n\nBack up to Google Drive so you don\'t lose your data when you reinstall the app or change device.

You have a backup, but you have not restored data from it on this device.

We recommend restoring data from a backup.

After successfully restoring data, the application will restart for the changes to take effect.

You have already restored data from a backup to this device or created a copy from this device, so restoring data from a backup is not required.

However, you can force the application to update the data in the application with the data from the backup if necessary.

After successfully updating the data , the application will restart for the changes to take effect.
Force update data in the app
An error occurred while signing in with your Google account
An error occurred while creating the backup
The data was successfully restored, the application will now restart
An error occurred while restoring data
An error occurred while checking for a backup
Or restore your data from a backup
Disconnecting your account will sign you out of your account and revoke permission to access your Google Drive
